response.overview: Serious weekdays. You have to listen to the news, appear informed and react to the news. We don't get to it because we have to follow the events. There is an unbearable amount of things happening on Earth at this very moment. At the same time, we read, watch and listen to the events that shake the world every minute. Stop. Let's stop the up-to-date seriousness!  Let's find an empty house, bring friends and start playing.  THE "CAMP"presents the unfolding of such a game through a community event built together by children and adults, reorganized annually, where everyone has time and space to find their own thoughts. We are joining one of the summer tournaments of the Tócsa camp, i.e. children's vacation, where this special game has been played since 2010.
response.title: Tábor
